info.name: School Management System API
info.description: Comprehensive API for managing authentication, users, schools, students, teachers, parents, grades, and classes in a school management system.

request.description: Register a new user with role-specific details.
Log in a user and receive access and refresh tokens.
Refresh an access token using a refresh token.
Log out a user by invalidating the refresh token. Requires SUPER_ADMIN, PRINCIPAL, TEACHER, or PARENT role.
Request a password reset token.
Reset a user's password using a reset token.
Retrieve a paginated list of users. SUPER_ADMIN only.
Retrieve a user by ID. SUPER_ADMIN or the user themselves.
Update a user's details. SUPER_ADMIN or the user themselves.
Delete a user. SUPER_ADMIN only.
Retrieve a paginated list of schools. SUPER_ADMIN, PRINCIPAL, TEACHER, or PARENT.

response.name: Success

request.description: Retrieve a school by ID. SUPER_ADMIN, PRINCIPAL, TEACHER, or PARENT.

response.name: Success

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Test School",
  "address": "123 Test St",
  "city": "Test City",
  "state": "Test State",
  "country": "Test Country",
  "postalCode": "12345",
  "phone": "123-456-7890",
  "email": "school@example.com",
  "website": "https://school.example.com",
  "logoUrl": "https://example.com/logo.jpg",
  "adminUserId": "uuid"
}

request.description: Create a new school. SUPER_ADMIN only.

response.name: Success

request.description: Update a school's details. SUPER_ADMIN only.

response.name: Success

request.description: Delete a school. SUPER_ADMIN only.
Retrieve a paginated list of students. SUPER_ADMIN, PRINCIPAL, TEACHER, or PARENT (restricted to their associated school).
Retrieve a student by ID. SUPER_ADMIN, PRINCIPAL, TEACHER, or PARENT (restricted to their associated school).
Create a new student. SUPER_ADMIN or PRINCIPAL only.
Update a student's details. SUPER_ADMIN or PRINCIPAL only.
Delete a student. SUPER_ADMIN or PRINCIPAL only.
Retrieve a paginated list of teachers. SUPER_ADMIN, PRINCIPAL, or TEACHER (restricted to their associated school).
Retrieve a teacher by ID. SUPER_ADMIN, PRINCIPAL, or TEACHER (restricted to their associated school).
Create a new teacher. SUPER_ADMIN or PRINCIPAL only.
Update a teacher's details. SUPER_ADMIN or PRINCIPAL only.
Delete a teacher. SUPER_ADMIN or PRINCIPAL only.
Retrieve a paginated list of parents. SUPER_ADMIN, PRINCIPAL, TEACHER, or PARENT (restricted to their associated school).
Retrieve a parent by ID. SUPER_ADMIN, PRINCIPAL, TEACHER, or PARENT (restricted to their associated school).
Create a new parent. SUPER_ADMIN or PRINCIPAL only.
Update a parent's details. SUPER_ADMIN or PRINCIPAL only.
Delete a parent. SUPER_ADMIN or PRINCIPAL only.
Retrieve a paginated list of grades. SUPER_ADMIN, PRINCIPAL, TEACHER, or PARENT (restricted to their associated school).
Retrieve a grade by ID. SUPER_ADMIN, PRINCIPAL, TEACHER, or PARENT (restricted to their associated school).
Create a new grade. SUPER_ADMIN, PRINCIPAL, or TEACHER only.
Update a grade's details. SUPER_ADMIN, PRINCIPAL, or TEACHER only.
Delete a grade. SUPER_ADMIN, PRINCIPAL, or TEACHER only.
Retrieve a paginated list of classes. SUPER_ADMIN, PRINCIPAL, TEACHER, or PARENT (restricted to their associated school).
Retrieve a class by ID. SUPER_ADMIN, PRINCIPAL, TEACHER, or PARENT (restricted to their associated school).
Create a new class. SUPER_ADMIN or PRINCIPAL only.
Update a class's details. SUPER_ADMIN or PRINCIPAL only.
Delete a class. SUPER_ADMIN or PRINCIPAL only.
